data.name: 无路可退 No Way Back
data.detailed_description:
"No way back" is a cartoon style third person shooting game. If you like speed and challenge, I don't think you should miss it.

game background [/]
After turning off the computer, the player puts the headset on the W key of the keyboard! The protagonists of all games in the computer began to move forward uncontrollably! Players need to control the protagonist of the game "there is no way back" in the computer: brother chicken, constantly challenge himself in the difficult level, improve his technology, and finally try to break the third wall, inform the owner of the computer and ask him to take away his headphones.

game mechanism [/]
The game does not require keyboard. The left mouse button fires fire and the right mouse button jumps. Gain permanent acceleration after killing the enemy, but also pay attention to whether it is too fast to control! Each level has a new mechanism and target design. In the subsequent updates, the game will continue to integrate new game mechanisms and challenges.

multiple challenges [/]
Overcome multiple challenges in high-speed gun battle! High difficulty platform jump, low fault tolerance boss war, grow in failure!

data.short_description: No way out is a cartoon style third person shooting game. You need to play the main character of the game, chicken bro, who is forced to move forward because the 'W' of keyboard is pressed by the headset. Defeat the enemy, get speed and overcome different levels with different mechanisms.
